page.title: 08Farm Machinery Contractors.
page.content: Mr Foster has lived in the village at Middle Farm since 1949. Most of the land belonging to Middle Farm has been sold and now only 30 acres remain. Mr Foster now contracts out agricultural machinery to farmers in the area. His machinery includes three tractors, two JCBs, a combine harvester and two balers. He employs four men who drive the machinery and they work from 8am until 5pm. The busiest time of the year is July until September when the crops are being harvested. Mr Foster has had the business for 20 years. The farm also has stables and there are eight horses which include a 20 year old Shetland pony. The horses are ridden by girls from Cottingham. The farm includes two fields of grass and ten acres of barley.
